titles.title: To provide for reclassification of certain counties for purposes of reimbursement under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/6/2001--Introduced. Provides that, effective for discharges occurring on or after October 1, 2001, for purposes of making disproportionate share payments under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, the large urban area of New York, New York, is deemed to include Orange County and Dutchess County, New York.
